dct_title_s: Carte du gouvern.t d'Alger et d'une partie du bassin de la Méditerranée ..
dct_description_sm: par A.H. Dufour ; la topographie gravée par Flahaut ; N.elle éd. rev. et aug.tée. ; Scale 1: 1,600,000 ; Prime meridian: Paris ; Map originally folded ; Relief shown by hachures ; Six inset maps: Camp Retranché de Sidi-Feruch construit par le génie militaire –Itinéraire d'Alger à Médéya -- Environs de Constantine / d'après Mr. le Cap.ne St. Hyppolite -- Établissement militaire de la Tafna -- Environs d'Alger, (Al-Djezaïr.) -- Alger ; Label pasted on back: 'Ch. Picquet, géographe du roi et du Duc d'Orléans.' ; Paris : Ch.les Picquet
dct_rights_sm: The images on this web site, from maps in the collection of the Melville J. Herskovits Library of African Studies and housed in the Government & Geographic Information Collection of Northwestern University Libraries are in the public domain in the United States, and as such, not subject to copyright restriction. The Libraries request users cite both the URL and Northwestern University Libraries if they wish to reproduce images from the repository. For access to higher resolution images please contact repository@northwestern.edu
